Whenever a player loses life, they lose 1 sanity.
As long as a player is insane, you may cast creature cards from graveyards. Creatures cast this way enter with a finality counter.

Double strike, indestructible
Nyarlathotep, Crawling Chaos can't attack or block unless your Sanity is 3 or less. [i](You start with 10 sanity. Zero sanity players are insane.)[/i]
Whenever a player casts a spell, they lose 1 sanity.
{1}: If a player is insane, choose a creature card name with mana value 7 or less. If you do, Nyarlathotep becomes a copy of the named card until end of turn.
cards.notes:
!tag:Lilypadms
cc9 finals
"fixed version" from Lily posted below the vote. Was a 4/8, last ability costed 0, had no insanity restriction, and the copy would also have double strike and indestructible.
